sub_title: Eigenaar / Owner bij MAMS Coffee B.V.
summary:
A passionate, goal oriented, experienced, senior manager with a proven history of managing business operations, developing individuals and leading management teams. Able to lead growth, building new international businesses and developing organizational capacity. A passion to drive successful retail brands (implementations) in different regions around the globe. Managing investments, costs and 3rd party relationships, while delivering results and maintaining alignment with corporate values and mission.

Competences; Business operations. General management/ P& L management. People development, coaching and leadership. Improve business processes. Manage 3rd party (supplier) relationships. store development, project management and international brand implementations and global supply chain management. 
A passion for retail. Able to build strong relationships, both internal and external, at all levels


Specialties: (I make good coffee :-))
General Management & Business Operations
Marketing, Brand management
Restaurant business
Manage 3PL partners & logistics
Sourcing, Global Procurement & Supplier management
Project Management
Retail (Store) Operations
Managerial & Senior Leadership

projects.title: Provide Marketing Basics training (3 day training) in Ethiopia to 5 Coop Unions (on behalf of Agriterra)
projects.description: in November I was in Ethiopia for a week to provide a 3 day Marketing Basics Training to 5 different Cooperatives. I was asked by Agriterra (www.agriterra.org) to provide the same marketing basics training as i did in Uganda earlier this year. Different country, 5 different Cooperatives (grains, teff, wheat, pea's, etc) same training.

contributors.headline: Eigenaar / Owner bij MAMS Coffee B.V.

projects.title: Host a 3-day Marketing Basics Training in Uganda (on behalf of Agriterra)
projects.description: I was in Uganda to provide a 3 day Marketing Basics Training to 4 different Cooperatives (Coffee, Cocoa/ Vanille & Mais) I was asked by Agriterra (www.agriterra.org) to provide the training together with Lonieke de Ruiter (who also wrote the training modules) and support/ train the different Cooperatives with their Marketing Action Plans. During the week I not only met very friendly and passionate people, though we also visited the facility of Ankole Coffee Producers Cooperative Union LTD (http://www.acpcultd.com/) impressive to see what they have accomplished (also with the support of Agriterra). The last day of the week a former Coffee trader (Charles Angebault, living in Uganda) presented the process (from start to finish/ contract, price etc) to enable export of the high quality Uganda Coffee beans. After an intensive week in Uganda my assignment is done, it is now up to the participants to put it into practise and to start the real work.

contributors.headline: Eigenaar / Owner bij MAMS Coffee B.V.

projects.title: Support Agriterra with preparing a strategic plan for MCCMCU in Kenya
projects.description: I was asked by Agriterra (www.agriterra.org) to support the Meru County Coffee Millers Co-Operative Union (MCCMCU) with their strategic plan towards 2019. After an intensive week of hard work with Wilfred Chepkwony from Agriterra Kenya (based in Nairobi), we managed to get the strategic plan & goals towards 2019 on paper. Now it is up to the team of MCCMCU to start the real work.

contributors.headline: Eigenaar / Owner bij MAMS Coffee B.V.

profile_positions.description:
MAMS Coffee; a Dutch coffee brand started in 2015, selling whole bean coffee & homemade cakes to cafes, restaurants, sport & office locations and since September 2015 we opened our first store in Arnhem. (MAMS coffee & more) (Willemsplein 45) open from 8am till 20. Our second store opened in September 2018 inside a brand new building from Hogeschool Utrecht (HL15) https://youtu.be/E-VcL3b7GXY
the story continues, in July2020 (During Covid) we opened our 3rd store also in Utrecht (Burg. Fockema Andreaplein 1) in January 2021, we extended our store m2 in Arnhem and doubled in size by adding a 1st floor with additional 75 seating. In August 2022 we opend our 4th store in Utrecht (again inside the Hogeschool Utrecht, location Padualaan 101)

check-out FB for updates: https://www.facebook.com/MamsCoffee 
or follow us on Instagram: mams_coffee
profile_positions.title: Eigenaar / Owner

profile_positions.description: MAMS Business B.V. is closely linked to MAMS Coffee & more. We will supply not only our own MAMS stores with products like coffee beans, tea, cups and other products/ items needed to operate our stores in the Netherlands, als we will also supply Restaurants, Supermarkets and other B2B customers with MAMS products or (restaurant) related products
profile_positions.title: Eigenaar/ Owner

profile_positions.description:
2Maar B.V.
"To Manage Accounts and Retail"

2Maar provides senior leadership and management consultancy for long term and short term projects. We are able to support management teams at mid-size and large (international) companies. Experienced in helping (retail) brands to build and maintain their brand (stores) worldwide, by effective supply chain & project management solutions and using an international network of partners. (Second opinion sourcing of non consumer products)

Main focus areas are: (freelance, consultancy for different business area's)
General Management & Senior Leadership, Project management, Business Operations, Development and Organizational Restructuring.

profile_positions.description:
Starbucks Coffee Company EMEA (based in Amsterdam)

Responsible for all Store Development supply chain activities to ensure new store openings and maintain operating stores throughout the EMEA region. Support function to enable the Starbucks country offices (throughout the EMEA Region) with their store opening programms. A central role that combines, procurement, supply chain, systems, processes, store construction, quality, supplier compliance and brand consistancy.
